heading: HR01675
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO STRONGLY DENOUNCE THE BLATANT DISREGARD OF PEOPLE’S HEALTH AND SAFETY IN THE DENGUE VACCINE SCANDAL AND TO IMMEDIATELY ADDRESS THE PEOPLE’S CALL FOR JUSTICE AND ACCOUNTABILITY
